channel.title: Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' ...
channel.description: Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' ...

item.title: Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' ...[0-50]
item.description:
Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' ... Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' alternative
President Donald Trump on Thursday said he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.
"Our alternative is an excellent one," Trump told reporters at the White House.
Asked if he would speak with Chinese President Xi Jinping, Trump said, "Well, he just wrote me a beautiful letter, I just received it, and I'll probably speak to him by phone."
轉自CNBC
item.content:encoded:
kira1988:
Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' ...
Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' alternative
President Donald Trump on Thursday said he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.
"Our alternative is an excellent one," Trump told reporters at the White House.
Asked if he would speak with Chinese President Xi Jinping, Trump said, "Well, he just wrote me a beautiful letter, I just received it, and I'll probably speak to him by phone."
轉自CNBC
